ygData.subject: RE: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: Day of the week to play: Everyday Time of day: Whenever the sun is up or down Longest stretch of continuous play: Don t recall, I was fading in and out.
ygData.messageBody:
Day of the week to play: Everyday

Time of day: Whenever the sun is up or down

Longest stretch of continuous play: Don't recall, I was fading in and out.
Falling asleep while fighting in Befallen is a bad idea by the way..

Way to have game sounds: Very loud

Distance to sit from display: Arm length

TV show to have on: Sold my TV to pay for a Dragoon Dirk

Music to listen to: Anything but the Rivervale hobbit song

Beverage (non-alcoholic): Jolt

Beverage (alcoholic): Bloody Mary w/Absolut.. or red wine. Lots of red
wine.

Health Food: Vegetarian spicy imitation chicken nuggets

Junk Food: Anything on the 7-11 candy aisle. Jujufruits preferred.

Clothes to wear: Clothes? Bah! Just adds to the downtime when you have to
make a bathroom run.
